website_summaries.verdict: Choose this pet casket if you want a stable design and a low price. Made of lasting polystyrene by a trusted company that stands by its products.
pros: An affordable, traditional casket that is built to last
Available in several sizes in black or white
Falls on the lower end of the price range for models in its class
cons: Some customers question its durability under thick, heavy soil
This is not a fancy casket, but if your budget is a concern, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: necessity and lack of options made me get this :( it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Basically, it's a molded plastic casket. They charge entirely too much money for this - though I've bought 2 of them out of necessity. There really isn't anything else I could find to bury my beloved cats in when they passed. They probably should not charge more than $25 dollars for this - and that is probably a fair mark up for the few dollars it must cost to manufacture them. It just makes an extremely difficult time feel even worse - though they do meet your need if you want to bury your pet. sigh. :(
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: It was a terrible time for our family but we needed to order ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a terrible time for our family but we needed to order something to bury our small dog. It was shipped to us over night and worked perfect. I would suggest ordering one size bigger if your not sure of the exact size. Our dog was 18-20 pounds and the medium was perfect with his favorite blanket. I mention this because reading the measurements you would think the small would have been right but I'm glad we went with the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Tincu

customer_reviews.title: The last pet casket I purchased a few years ago was over $300 and it was very nice, but the place I purchased it from no ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, my beloved Chihuahua passed away and I wanted her buried in a casket. The last pet casket I purchased a few years ago was over $300 and it was very nice, but the place I purchased it from no longer sells pet caskets. I found this casket online and ordered the small size casket and I was able to bury her with a dog bed and blanket and the size was large enough to fit the dog bed and blanket. I like that you're able to seal this, as well. This shipped quickly and the owner was helpful and pleasant to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product. It was actually sturdier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. It was actually sturdier than I expected. I was unsure if we could afford a pet casket, but this is very reasonably priced for the quality. We have 2 Bichon Frise dogs and they are like our babies. Both are seniors now. Our oldest at 14 years old has cancer, and we bought this for future use. It means a lot to me that I know she will be buried properly, like a family member. We owe that to her for all of the love and joy that she brought to our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: my daughter was devastated when her beloved pet died. simply putting him in a bag and burying him would not do. this casket was very reasonably priced, as I did look around. it is as pictured but being empty allowed us to make a special blanket for our pet. it was perfect for our needs. they delivered within a couple of days and they even inquired on us before and after the delivery.having this casket made it much easier for my daughter to lay her beloved pet to rest. I would recommend them to all my friends and family .
customer_reviews.author: Turene Ross

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up more than you think you need.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected but I got the large and they aren't as large as I thought they would be even though I measured. I should have got the XL but they were out of stock. So now I'll have to stuff Rover in there nice and tight with some of his toys and blankets. Def. will have to get him in there before rigamortis sets in. My dogs are both around 70# which I think of as a medium size for a dog but the casket in large will be a very tight fit. So if in doubt order the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Purchased product in advance of a pending use. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product in advance of a pending use. My son will be needing this soon as his long term dog has health issues and he had asked for permission to bury when needed on family property. I thought at the least to order a burial container that would be needed and used at the time. It was received and we have this available for my son in advance of. We know when this does occur he will not be thinking about the details but will appreciate the efforts done inadvance to reduce the stress and burden on his family and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P in NC

customer_reviews.title: May My Coon Cat RIP
customer_reviews.text: Hard to give a good "review" on a casket after you lose your beloved pet. But this did the trick. After I had my beloved 12 year old Coon Cat Dickie put to sleep. Because of cancer. I laid him in it peacefully with his toys and can of Fancy Feast. I laid the casket with him in it. In a 4 foot grave and said a Lord's Prayer for animals. RIP Dickster. You will be so missed....:(
customer_reviews.author: Seawater

customer_reviews.title: A comfort to lay to rest.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very emotional purchase, but I am very pleased with the support from Pet Memorial Shop and the quality of the product. I ordered the pet casket and it came the next day and I received a very comforting email letting me know the tracking so I would know when it was coming. Along with another email offering me support, compassion and understanding of what I was going through. A really nice company to make a purchase from. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: ... relief to have this well built casket for our loved fellow. We were able to bury him at ...
customer_reviews.text: What a huge relief to have this well built casket for our loved fellow. We were able to bury him at our family property at the lake where he enjoyed spending time and where he belonged.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It provides a good, sealed environment for a beloved pet.
customer_reviews.text: The primary reason I purchased this other than an impending need, was it was much cheaper than many of the alternatives. Having now used it, I believe that in the future as other pets pass on, I will order it again. Prior to purchasing this product, I made a box for my pets. But the cost of material and time and quality of work were not as sufficient as I'd hoped. So we purchased this pet casket as our dear dog was close to passing. It fit her well. Both my wife an I were pleased with how this worked.
customer_reviews.author: fearless359

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic container with a lid
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent enough container with a sealing strip, but it is way overpriced for what it is. It's just a plastic box. This should be like $20. Seriously. I purchased another casket 10 years ago for another animal and it had a wood like finish and was lined with a soft fabric with a pillow for this price or less.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This was size Medium I wish I bought large- I lined it - it came empty
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine May 2019 and she was on Hospice care for 16 months- It has sealer stickers yet we used Rainbow Bridge duct tape to re-inforce staying closed. I lined this with fleece and fabric. It came a big plastic box. I also wish I got the large - this was MEDIUM for 12 POUND Little Angel. There was not room for all her favorite toys. So I would go a size large than they reccomend if you want to have room for a comfortable position and a few favorite things. All my love to you if you are buying here today - this is Heart Shattering xo
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My little love-14 Ibs maltase was quite snugged. It was okay, but I almost wished I ordered larger one.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend! My husband and I were pleased to have a dignity burial for our true family member that gave us his unconditional love for nearly 14 years. I was able to lay him on his own blanket with his tennis ball so that he can play catch in haven. Be cautious how to apply the tape. We did it the wrong way and there's no way to take it off. We just end up cutting left over pieces and applied to the corners.Thank you! It definitely made a difference to have a proper casket for our fury love.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed fast.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we needed at our time of grieving . My pug fit perfect . My daughter made decorations for the out side .
customer_reviews.author: james bosler

customer_reviews.title: Basic, a good value, but pet weight is overstated
customer_reviews.text: We needed a coffin quickly for our precious Beagle who passed away suddenly. It was great to get this with same-day shipping. The coffin was as described and very basic. My only concern is that the description for the medium sized coffin overstates the weight of the pet. Our Beagle was 30 pounds, and it was a tight fit. When in doubt, order a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: P. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: We were so very pleased with our purchase we thank for getting it to us quickly
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say that the casket was beautiful and made very well. I was so glad I bought this one. We needed it quickly and I was so happy it arrived in 2 days. We were able to lay our precious to rest. The size was perfect and I liked the way the lid fit tight down. Thank you for a great product. We will in the future order again because we have other older dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect resting place for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: As hard as it was to let my kitty Jessie go, I was able to find a perfect place for her to rest in. She had cancer and was given 1-2 months. She was with us for 6 months, eating, drinking, pooping and peeing till the end. As I was searching for a burial item for her, I found this one. It was ideal for her as I had room to lay her in with her blanket. It was durable and had a nice seal on it which helped me. I added a sentiment on the top with just a Sharpie. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product, feels quite strong & durable. The price was rather high, but a very nice casket for our beloved kitty. Would have preferred a different color, but the only way to purchase this item in black would have been to order a "used" casket.. Can't help but notice a bit of a conundrum in a "used" casket ??
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this casket. Our beloved cat of only 2 1/2 years was laid to rest today. We buried him in our backyard. This is a terrible situation but it’s really difficult because he was so young. I will always miss him but my heart can rest somewhat knowing that he has a sturdy foundation to rest in. Thank you for making this.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Edit: Excellent Purchase - apologies to the seller
customer_reviews.text: I originally put in a scathing review but it was for the wrong casket. I ordered another which was just so flimsy I couldn't do anything with it. However, this one I just took out after more than a year in storage and all I can say is wow. Thank you all so much for an excellent casket. I am extremely pleased as is my poor 17-year old dog that will sleep in it tomorrow. Excellent company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Inexpensive Product that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as described, and this is the second time I have purchased a casket from this company.....It is very sturdy and a cheaper alternative to those expensive caskets. We cannot bury pets where I live, and I have my previous pet all sealed up in my shed until I can move to a new home with some land to bury him, and very soon his best friend will join him, so I am happy that they will continue to be together for ever. For those wondering, the seal on the casket works great, and there is no smell whatsoever if you have to store your pet temporarily, or in my case, it has been almost 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: "ROAD RAGE"

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Preserving Four Legged Family Members
customer_reviews.text: Our beloved Son, Ozzy, was laid to rest on Sat. May 7th. He would have turned 12 tomorrow on May 12th. Thank you so much Christine for starting Pet Memory Shop, and for carrying such an excellent casket at an affordable price for those who want to give their family pets a kind of vault burial in order to preserve the remains of the family members that brought them so much joy, and in case pet owners ever move and want the future option of relocating their dear pets with them. Ozzy was so loved and will be greatly missed beyond forever!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our less than 5lb geriatric cat.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 15 year old cat. He once weighed 13lbs. He was very sick and lost down to under 5lbs. We are very pleased. Received in 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa/Douglas Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Sadly on 3-15-19 we lost our beloved cat Friday. He was 17 years old. We was told three days earlier that he had cancer an we didn't know how much time he had left but with his symptoms I knew it wouldn't be long. I ordered the pet memory box an it got here so fast! I'm so grateful because we lost him the day after we received it. The seller was amazing and I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Mullen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Box
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank you for having this beautiful box available and delivered in such short notice. This is the only non-biodegradable box out there and it was a no brainer. I loved the box and I’m rest assured that my cat is resting in peace.
customer_reviews.author: Boriqua

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well for the most horrific thing like burring my little baby after 19 years this made it some how easier and more humane
customer_reviews.author: Gina salvo

customer_reviews.title: Check size needs carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased medium white for a deceased kitty. Almost too large but was concerned small wouldn't work. I like features described. Sturdy. Purchased colorful baby blankets to compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ricards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The casket arrived on time and undamaged . Very well made and the size is as described ! I'm really happy with the quality of the product and feel good about my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Steve Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Prepared
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago my little chihuahua was diagnosed with congestive heart failure. Then a few weeks ago we almost lost him, his heart had stopped. I decided then and there that I did not want to be caught unprepared, when the time came for me to say goodbye to my little doggy I wanted to be ready and not have to make a decision in that most difficult moment. I started to search out pet caskets and due to the fact that Pet Memory Shops caskets are sturdy and seal tight, water proof and will keep other animals from digging him up, this was my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works but not worth $99.00
customer_reviews.text: It's just mad of durable plastic and not worth $99.00. You could probably find something comparable at most stores for about $70.00 less. PlastIc container seals with basically double stick tape.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G Hubbard Jr

customer_reviews.title: Coffin
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. So much better for a cat that's been a part of your life for 20 years than a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mehring

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this product. It was a difficult time but this product provided a peace of ming knowing that my little dog could keep dry and gave a proper service.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H. Prater

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well but it will do the job order larger size than your pet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because I needed them to bury my beloved pets they are not large whatsoever ordered a medium and a medium looks like a small definitely if you must go through this process order of at least a size
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jean Carver Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and just as described! Very pretty and nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very respectable company and even sent a signed rainbow bridge card with deepest sympathies. Very quick next day shipping! Just when I needed it! I’m glad I chose this casket for my forever baby girl Sara Rose my 12 year old little dog. Thank u! Highly recommend ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Audra L.

customer_reviews.title: Your product gave me peace and comfort for my pets forever bed
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy review to give given the circumstances. I was very pleased with your product and comfortable using it for my pet of 14 years. I felt he would be enclosed in an air tight casket due to the seal that was provided. It gave me great comfort and peace knowing he was laid to rest in his forever bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aboungleen King

customer_reviews.title: Sadly its was what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It was great that we find this. We was able to bring it to the vet when we picked up our beloved Silky yorkie "Lucky". It also made the burial easier. Theres a tape that seals the pod so its waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Sims

customer_reviews.title: That it can be sealed. I love that part. And very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have some type of padding in it. I ordered the medium one thinking the sm. one would be to sm. But it's big enough to put all three of our dogs in one. I love the idea that they can be sealed so no water drainage or dirt can penetrate the casket.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger than you think you need.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for such a good product. I buried my Precious dog Sadie this past Wednesday. This casket served its purpose perfectly with room for some bedding a small pillow and I covered her with her favorite blanket.... As others have said, order one size larger than you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: the size for the small container isn't correct
customer_reviews.text: it is 18 long by 9 wide and only 4 1/2 deep, no way my pup who only weighs 22 pounds could fit into this container. returning
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Perry

customer_reviews.title: Helped me decide between burial and cremation
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small for my beloved budgie who passed away at 11 years of age. It was rather big for him, but I didn't care. I was able to fill the inside with fake flowers and his favorite toys. I had a hard time choosing between burial and cremation in case we ever moved. I couldn't stand the thought of just putting him in the ground or cremating him, so I was very happy to find this option at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Chibs

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased to see how will made it was and how ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to see how will made it was and how well it was able to see you
customer_reviews.author: Yolly

customer_reviews.title: Very good - and It was delivered fast
customer_reviews.text: No one wants to need this product to bury their beloved pet but it is a very good product if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economy Pet Casket
customer_reviews.text: We received the economy pet casket on time and in good condition. We hope we do not need to use it for a long time but our dog is 15 now. It is large enough for a small dog weighing around 16 lbs. It is simple, we will put her favorite blanket and toy with her when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: saxman

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. I don't think that the weight of dirt would cause it to collapse. However, when in doubt I would buy a larger size. The small would not be big enough for my cats... maybe a small breed dog. I like to put a few belongings in with my animals. The medium allowed me to do that for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Bode

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this purchase during this time of grief. Quality, hard plastic material. A good quality product that will hold up over time at a reasonable price point. Not disappointed at all. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Re00770

customer_reviews.title: Resting place for our Pet
customer_reviews.text: The pet casket arrived when they said it would in very good condition. Tape to seal it was a little hard to get in place because of the narrow width. Otherwise, very pleased with their product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zickrick

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: The size and durability makes me feel better about placing my best little fur baby in the cold ground. He’s been by me for 16 years and there is just enough room for a blanket and special toy.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star because I dont like it. Its sturdy plastic and it may suit your pets needs. Its a plastic box for 100$...
customer_reviews.author: Charlysimone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and simple look. The white color and material make it great for everyone who loved my dog to write messages of love and goodbyes on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bush

customer_reviews.title: It was the right size
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly the right size. The only thing I didn't like was the way you had to seal it. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankful
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. It was a relief to find this product and to get it so fast. Happy with product, made a bad situation easier.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Maciel

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dignified casket which allows the pet owner to add their own personal touches for their pet.
customer_reviews.text: Your product was received timely and as advertised. I purchased the medium size for our small cat, but it allowed room to place some of her favorite items with her without crowding. It was so helpful when the time came to have everything prepared for her. Thank you for your caring statements of support during the ordering and shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: M Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - lost my 60lb weimaraner
customer_reviews.text: Nice product - lost my 60lb weimaraner. Would go to a larger size for anything over 60 lbs, especially if they are long/tall.
customer_reviews.author: Danyell

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I haven't had to use it yet
customer_reviews.text: The casket is not as pictured. It is solid white instead of tan outside and white inside in the picture. The corners aren't angled as shown, they are just straight. Although not a big deal, I feel that a product should be exactly as shown. Fortunately, I haven't had to use it yet, so I can't attest to its quality in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Patti B

customer_reviews.title: Better than the wood caskets I made years past.
customer_reviews.text: Recently used this for our old dog. Strong, comes with an adhesive seal. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, repeat customer. Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Second time using Pet Memory Shop. Product is exactly as advertised. Timely response (email and delivery). Item well packaged for shipping. Met my expectations for product and price. Will continue to use this seller. Recommend with no hesitation. Cons: NONE!
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: very sad situation losing my cat
customer_reviews.text: It was a very, very sad situation losing my cat. Christine at Pet Memory Shop was unbelievably consoling and made sure everything was helpful to us. This business is just great. They are caring and keep in contact to make sure every thing is good. I highly recommend PET MEMORY SHOP. This is picture of my Jack.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine DelMastro

customer_reviews.title: Our 14 years old beautiful beloved dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 years old beautiful beloved dog, Max, died a few days ago. We want to bury him in our backyard so we ordered this sturdy casket. I would recommend this product. to any dog lovers.
customer_reviews.author: st

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was well constructed and the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: This company is compassionate and very good to work with! Our pet casket came just as described and quickly. There was even a sympathy note included, which was very touching and nice. Thanks for a great experience! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the customer service by Pet Memory Shop
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the customer service by Pet Memory Shop, they sent an email to make sure I got what I needed and if I had any questions to contact them directly. I purchased the medium sized caskets for my cat based on the reviews - I didn't need that big of a casket as my cat lost a lot of weight during her last year. The small would fit a 10-12lb cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: Losing our beloved pet was extremely hard. But Thank you for offering these caskets it allowed us to put our pet to rest in a proper way.
customer_reviews.author: Susana C. Becerril

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's sealable/non-biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at various garden figures and stones for pet graves and came across the casket - I didn't know these existed for pets. I like that it's sealable/non-biodegradable. We needed a way to properly and respectfully bury our awesome 16 yr old dog who passed away and this was it. We had it overnighted and it was delivered on time which we needed during this tough time, thx.
customer_reviews.author: recomshop

customer_reviews.title: Keeping this pet casket.
customer_reviews.text: I guess that in the grand scheme of things, it's okay. But the product I received does not at all look like the posted pictures, nor does it match the description. I was going to return it initially, but have decided to keep it in the event that our beloved cat dies before it could be replaced with something else. Please just do update the photos shown and the description accurately. Thank you. Norm
customer_reviews.author: Norm W. Kriedman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sad that we need these things. Aside from that it will serve its purpose. The measurements provided are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very good pet casket
customer_reviews.text: A sad day was made better by this very good pet casket. Air tight and just right fit. I would buy again, hopefully not too soon.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Rest In Peace
customer_reviews.text: Your product is larger than I expected, but that is on the plus side. Thank you very much for this wonderful product, others on the marked are bio-degradable which does not fare well with me. I want my pet to be inside a protected environment while he in Rests In Peace‎. Just a post script; I have seven (7) cats and one (1) dog and they are all going to be in this product when they pass. I am so happy that I found this company and this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: that it is water proof.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. It was perfect for my beloved pet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't disrespect your pet with something like this
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I needed something very quickly, cons were that's it's super flimsy for the amount of money. Also size was way off ordered a medium after doing measurements and wouldve needed L or Xl and this was for a small breed dog...
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that you wish you never had to purchase, but I'm glad it is available. My grandfather who was a carpenter used to make small wooden caskets for our animals over the years but he has since passed. These caskets are a suitable replacementioned. Good quality item for my kitty's final resting spot.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie L.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: very good for the purpose, durable for our cat's funeral
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Such a sad occasion but the speedy shipping and quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a sad occasion but the speedy shipping and quality of the product left at least this item without concerns.
customer_reviews.author: P. D.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase! Sturdy construction. Purchased a memory foam bath mat that lined it perfectly before placing my Westie to rest in it. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KamoKam's mom

customer_reviews.title: My dear cat was about 20" long and the medium size was perfect with enough room to cover her with her favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: The casket is well made of a heavy plastic and, using the sticky tape provided, seals tightly. My dear cat was about 20" long and the medium size was perfect with enough room to cover her with her favorite blanket. I was very pleased with the prompt arrival of the item. I paid for 2 day shipping and it was delivered on time. Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a thicker bead to make proper placement and insure a perfect seal less tedious
customer_reviews.text: The casket was adequate. My only real concern was the sealant provided. Could have been a thicker bead to make proper placement and insure a perfect seal less tedious.. Ample space for my ferret Hannah in the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Just what I needed. Wish the cost had been about half, but I am now prepared when the worst occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Tallie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Have not been able to use the casket yet, ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to use the casket yet, but I am prepared. My beloved Maurice, feline, 18 & 1/2 year old has not told me he is ready to go yet. With an enlarged heart the desease is taking its hold. Small stroke, 10 days later seizure, he is still walking, eating, and basking in the sun. At least I know I am ready, when he travels to be with the Angels. Barbara
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The casket was perfect for our special pet cat that passed away
customer_reviews.text: The casket was perfect for our special pet cat that passed away. It was an easy setup and appeared to be something that will last a long time.It was a nice final gift for our friend.
customer_reviews.author: KTekMan

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this Pet Casket the only think that I found ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Pet Casket the only think that I found with it was the size was smaller than I thought it was they said up to a 50 pound pet and it was really to small for my Min-Pin just a little short and narrow. The next size would have been way to big maybe they need to add about 3 inches to it all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Tia
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the small for our Baby Tia it was perfect. Was able to add a blanket and customize the top just for her.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lee

customer_reviews.title: A quality casket for your beloved pet
customer_reviews.text: My pet casket was exactly as it appeared and what I expected. It is very durable and I appreciate that tape was included. I received friendly emails from the vendor letting me know how to contact them with any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this casket knowing my best companion was going to pass away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this casket knowing my best companion was going to pass away. This was one of the hardest things I've done. My prescious girl fit perfectly in it with her small blanket she liked to lay on. Her name was Kalli, she was a rescue kitty I got 11 years ago. The casket was made much more durable then the one I got for another one of my babies that died just 21/2 weeks earlier from the vets. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casket
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we lost our beautiful beloved cat. This fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Violetrix Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: What the right size is very sturdy perfect for bearing in the ground not worried about any water leakage at all
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: The medium Economy Pet Casket was too small for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The medium Economy Pet Casket was too small for my dog that weighed 35 pounds. I ordered this size because it stated this size would be suitable for a dog up to 60 pounds. The dimensions were not listed on the Amazon.com. Please make sure to list the dimensions clearly next to the weight information.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Walmsley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Received our order in a very timely manner, along with e-mails from the company checking to see how we were doing and if there was anything they could help with further. Highly recommend this product. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: The product was good for our needs and we received a responsive offer ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was good for our needs and we received a responsive offer for assistance if we needed it from the seller. We would recommend this. Obviously its tough having to use this, but we were glad something like this was available for us. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bowden

customer_reviews.title: I feel they are a good quality product and I have been pleased with them ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these caskets for my pets. I feel they are a good quality product and I have been pleased with them and will definitely order another one again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the happiest of purchases
customer_reviews.text: Not the happiest of purchases, but if you need a casket for a beloved family member this is a good one. It is as described, comes with sealant, and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quick service at a fair price. It would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick service at a fair price. It would be helpful to have sellers phone number so you could ask them some questions.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very helpful in a time of need. Wanted more than a cardboard box for our cat of 14 years.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item. We lost our furry family member and wanted to keep her close to home and opted to bury her at home. This casket was just what we needed, perfect size and good value. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Susannah

customer_reviews.title: I was wondering if cpvc glue would seal it better.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had thicker gasket sealer. I have my doubts it is air or water tight. I was wondering if cpvc glue would seal it better.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Schultz

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The seal was a little tricky to get in but other than that ok.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good delivery. I would recommend this product for anyone dealing with the loss of a beloved pet. .

customer_reviews.text: Premolded plastic container. Certainly not worth the price in my estimation.

customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our 16 year old Lhaso (Phoebe) who we lost on 11.20.15. The fact that it seals was a plus for us.

customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much ! My dear cat will have a proper burial .

customer_reviews.text: Pet Memory Shop delivered this pet casket very quickly, and it seems to be of good quality.

product_meta.title: Pet Memory Shop Pet Casket 2 Colors - Pet Loss Burial Memorial - USA's #1 Choice for Dogs, Cats, Animals, Gifts (Caring Series)
feature_bullets: AMERICA’S #1 PET CASKET. 10,000+ satisfied customers, absolute commitment to service and quality control. Choose the safe and trusted brand in your time of need.

SEND YOUR PET TO THE RAINBOW BRIDGE IN A DIGNIFIED, RESPECTFUL, LOVING, AND SAFE MANNER. Provide a peaceful service for all the love your pet has given. Our pets are family and a plastic bag or hole in the ground doesn’t adequately honor or protect our pets remains. Frequently an educational experience for children.

STRONG, SECURE, AND DURABLE. Not your ordinary plastic - will not crack, bend, or break during/after burial. Rest assured about the safety of your pet’s resting place. Suitable for dogs, cats, and other animals.

AIR-TIGHT, WATER-TIGHT, & NON-BIODEGRADABLE. Protects against scavengers and eliminates the risk of environmental contamination. Biodegradable caskets are not safe for the environment if your pet has been euthanized due to the chemicals in euthanasia anesthetics and drugs.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - If you don’t like it, simply return it for a 100% refund. No questions asked.
